thread.title: A Pleasent Business Trip
thread.title_full: A Pleasent Business Trip - Review of Waldorf Astoria Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Sumsul
title: A Pleasent Business Trip
text:
Was there for a short business trip - my 1st stay in this hotel. Lovely place with many nearby restaurant, shopping options of 1 RMB to any branded and best part is the very helpful , always smiling supporting stuff of the Hotel. Will be glad to come back and recommend to others.
Room Tip: If anyone looking for Gift Items, go to walking street and ask of 30% of the price what the shop own... See more room tips
